## Commands

<!--
List the commands someone needs to work on this project.
Include installation, development, testing, and deployment commands.
-->

### Setup

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Set up environment variables
cp .env.example .env
```

### Development

```bash
# Start development server
npm run dev

# Run tests
npm test

# Build for production
npm run build
```

### Deployment

```bash
# Deploy to production
npm run deploy
```
